location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire.In enclosure, extract from a letter from the Honourable Court of Directors dated 7 May 1813, informing that the Import Warehouse Keeper has been instructed to send cloths for the Persian Market to Bushire on the David Scott.
